attributes.action: Give ALL Asthma Suffers the COVID Vaccine next regardless of Severity
attributes.additional_details: Asthma can kill even if you have it under control. COVID is a respiratory disease. Asthma suffers need to be next. Some of us cannot wear masks so we are shielding but not been asked to. Asthma is dangerous and if we get COVID it is dangerous. All asthma patients should be next regardless of severity to save lives. You tell us to get the Flu Jab for free every year with pregnant, over 70s and diabetics, so why are we left out with COVID which is in the same family?!
attributes.background: The next stage of COVID Vaccines is due to be rolled out next week but not ALL asthma sufferers are on the list. COVID is a respiratory disease and asthma effects breathing. Anyone diagnosed with asthma should be next on the list for the vaccine. Asthma can kill regardless of severity!
